Html.content:
Imagine a JSP providing a list of resources by the usage of the <cms:contentload>.Â  To drop JSPs directly into a container page OpenCms offers dynamic functions.

  • Create a new dynamic function. Usually this resource is a part of the module and should be created in folder /system/modules/{mymodule}/functions/. E.g., in the module of the Development Demo the collector JSP is in folder: /system/modules/org.opencms.dev.demo/functions/.
  • Select the JSP containing the collector. E.g., in the module of the development demoit the JSP /system/modules/org.opencms.dev.demo/pages/collector.jsp.
  • To define the collector parameters set the initial request parameters in the dynamic function. E.g., in the collector.jsp of the development demo the parameters are set as follows:
    • folder=/dev-demo/collector-with-detail-page/.content/article/
    • type=ddarticle
    • count=5
  • Open a container page in ADE and drop the new dynamic function onto the page.
